article: Xiao Lin has a good friend.  _  name is Lucy. She's  _  the USA. She's American. Xiao Lin and Lucy are in  _  same class. They go to school five days a  _  .They stay  _  home on Saturday and Sunday. Lucy  likes  China and Chinese food. Her favorite food is rice. At school they play soccer  _  class. Xiao Lin eats  _  She often has tomatoes, rice, chicken and fruit for dinner.  _  Lucy doesn't like them. She often has ice- cream, bananas and  hamburgers  .
